review: Very cool streaming from phone or ipad or tablet and cheap price.
author: james richard fox

review: I liked it very much, A lots better then I though.
author: John E. Clements Sr.

review: What a great device.  Can stream anything from my computer to my TV.  So easy to use.  And so much less expensive than alternatives that do not offer anything more.  Actually have more variety with the Chromecast.  Can stream anything.
author: Julie M Wolfe

review: This little piece of technology is absolutely amazing. It's great for my room where I can cast any music or videos to my tv and sound system from my laptop on my desk. It's unbelievably convenient. Love it, 10/10 would buy again if anything happened to it, which I don;t think it will. Unless I'm being drunk and stupid.
author: John Cain

review: Does not hold hands well with my iPhone, very disappointed in this product
author: Lynette M Corcoran

review: Without Amazon link, not worth it...like Roku 3 that has remote and headphone connection on remote.
author: Harvey Leva
